item.title: about
item.description: Hi, my name’s Aarav and this is my website. I’m currently a software developer at Microsoft working on Azure Traffic Manager. In 2017 and 2018, I spent time interning (and competing in lots of puzzle and coding challenges) at Bloomberg, LP. I got a couple B.Sc.s from Virginia Tech (one in math and one in computer science) in 2018. I’ve spent time helping out at VTHacks (PR/organizing for the event) and VTHunt (making the site for the puzzle hunt).
